channel.title: Help with bows
channel.description:
well my crystal bow and my dark bow they both train melee stats... like attack def and str
how do i get it so it trains range??
MY IMPORTANT QUESTION
how do i make it so when u use d bow and c bow you can farcast... because everytime i hit with one of those bows it gets right next to them....
how do i fix??? tyvm
